Write a story about a time traveler who goes back in time and accidentally changes the course of history by preventing the oceans from turning into lemonade.
Create a poem that describes the regret of who missed the opportunity to witness the oceans turn into lemonade.
Write a screenplay for a movie that depicts the day the oceans turned into lemonade and the aftermath of this event.
Write a song that expresses the regret of the person who missed the chance to see the oceans turn into lemonade.
Create a short story that describes the impact of the oceans turning into lemonade on the environment and the creatures that live in it.
